name: Unlikely Heroes
description:
PRESENTATION


Unlikely Heroes is a 2D old-school RPG by the developers of Last Heroes and Grimoire Chronicles.

The evil Lich King, lord of the Undead, is rising once more. It weighs upon your shoulders to do what no one before could, defeat it once and for all, and rid humanity of this ultimate evil.
Embark on a classic storyline of good versus evil where not those who could are the heroes, but those who would.

FEATURES


Dynamic Party System!
Classic Storyline!
Intriguing Dungeons to Explore!

MORE GAMES FROM VALKYRIA


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1551330/Skyfall/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1532680/
